articles.author: Jeffrey Hutton (Regional Correspondent - The Straits Times)
articles.title: Cut off from family and savings, Russians on holiday in South-East Asia count the cost of war - The Star Online
articles.description: When he arrived in Bali nearly two weeks ago, after four days of quarantine in Jakarta, Viktor learnt that his adopted country of Russia had invaded his country of birth, Ukraine.
articles.content: DENPASAR (Bali), March 13 (The Straits Times/ANN): When he arrived in Bali nearly two weeks ago, after four days of quarantine in Jakarta, Viktor learnt that his adopted country of Russia had invaded… [+2383 chars]

articles.title: New crime docudrama adds insights to old cases including Geylang Bahru Tan Children Murders - AsiaOne
articles.description: As crime-solving technologies get more advanced, would it help shed some light on old criminal cases? A new Mediacorp docudrama Inside Crime Scene that was released on Friday (March 11) aims to provide new perspectives on six heinous crimes that shook Singapo…
articles.content:
